attributes.action: stop Ken Livingstone from using the london.gov.uk website for his personal propaganda
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The london.gov.uk website is paid for by all Londoners but at present is used by Ken Livingstone as an Orwellian mouthpiece for petty battles with the Evening Standard and to tell us how wonderful he is.  It is disgraceful behaviour in a democracy and should be stopped.  The website should be representative of all views and should not be used for personal propaganda and reactionary left wing nonsense.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
